'''15w34d''' is the thirteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on August 21, 2015<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20190710023828/https://www.mojang.com/2015/08/minecraft-snapshot-15w34a/</ref> to fix a memory allocation crash found in [[15w34c]].

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Hoe]]'''
* Now takes damage while attacking with it. 

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w34d|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|55654|Mobs transported from the Nether to the Overworld cannot be identified through commands.
|80228|Major projectile bug.
|80629|Changing spawner with <code>SpawnData</code> using spawn egg does not work.
|;dev
|85627|Empty lines on signs rendered as "null" when upgrading from 1.7.10 -> 1.8.8 -> 15w32c.
|86744|When player closes world and then open it back again, the attack indicator turns off.
|;previous
|86906|No durability for hoe.
|86911|Minecraft crashes with shield and ender pearl.
}}</onlyinclude>
